channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biotech is back. Here’s why these rallying stocks belong in your portfolio now.
item.description: The volatile sector is seeing greater stability, and these four stocks can profit.

item.title: ‘Business continues to be severely depressed’: U.S. manufacturers blame tariffs.
item.description: American manufacturing contracted for the eighth month in a row, a new survey showed, and there appeared to be no end in sight because of high tariffs...

item.title: Amazon’s new OpenAI deal offers further proof the stock has become an AI winner
item.description: Last week Amazon CEO Andy Jassy hinted at more big deals. The $38 billion OpenAI partnership proves he wasn’t kidding.

item.title: Eaton takes aim at $500 billion data-center backlog with its latest, biggest buyout this year
item.description: Eaton is spending $9.5 billion to acquire Boyd Thermal, as the company takes aim at the fast-growing data-center-construction business.

item.title: My father’s estate was awarded $50K in a class-action lawsuit. My brother, as executor, kept the money. What can we do?
item.description: “My brother retains the money awarded to my father to this day. My mom is still alive.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
